name: Tony Shark's
description:
This game was developed for the global game jam 2017 by the team Dat Op Games:

Djosef Wytemalhos - Design, Programmer, Artist.

Eric Dantas - Animator.

Indipen - Character artist.

Sabrina Lacerda - Scene Artist, Audio.

Saulo Mendes - Programmer, Audio.

You can download it for other operational systems here:
